div.ab: rāspīg (at the place of the srōšāwarzān): vid. VrS24.3.

Commentary.ab: VrS24.7d huδā̊biiō] sec. cod., Kellens; Geldner huδābiiō.

Parallels.ab: aməṣ̌aēibiiō spəṇtaēibiiō huxšaϑraēibiiō huδā̊biiō yauuaējibiiō yauuaēsubiiō yōi vaŋhə̄uš ā manaŋhō š́iieiṇti yā̊sca uiti = Y4.4; ~ Y39.3 spəṇtə̄ṇg aməṣ̌ə̄ṇg yauuaējiiō yauuaēsuuō yōi vaŋhə̄uš ā manaŋhō š́iieiṇtī yā̊scā ūitī
aməṣ̌aēibiiō spəṇtaēibiiō huxšaϑraēibiiō huδā̊biiō yauuaējibiiō yauuaēsubiiō = VrS27.12.

aməṣ̌aēibiiō spəṇtaēibiiō huxšaϑraēibiiō huδā̊biiō = VrS19.1, VrS89.25; ~ Y4.26, Y6.1, Y13.4, Y14.2, Y17.1, Y25.1, Y35.1, Y58.5, Y59.1, Y63.6, VrS14.4, VrS28.1, VrS65.15, VrS79.26, VrS81.1, VrS87.7, VrS89.25 aməṣ̌ā spəṇtā huxšaϑra huδā̊ŋhō; ~ Y70.1 aməṣ̌ə̄ spəṇtə̄ huxšaϑrə̄ huδā̊ŋhō; ~ Y56.3, Y56.4, Y65.17, Y65.18, VrS89.17, VrS89.20 aməṣ̌anąmcā spəṇtanąm huxšaϑranąm huδā̊ŋhąm; ~ Y65.12, Y65.13, VrS27.12 aməṣ̌ā̊ spəṇta huxšaϑra huδā̊ŋhō.
yauuaējibiiō yauuaēsubiiō ~ Yt19.11 (uγrəm kauuēm xᵛarənō) yauuaējīm yauuaēsūm.
